::Perndabot::

Perndabot watches Biomass come close, waiting for him to get a weapon 
out.

"So you're going to fight through this bare-handed?" he asks, ready 
to slash out at Biomass.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@h...> wrote:
> 
> 
> * Biomass had the idea of a simple hand-to-hand fight but there was 
a change 
> of plans when Perndabot drew the swords, he lifts his brow again, 
walking 
> towards Perndabot a bit and then stoping 5 ft away from him. He 
looks along 
> the blades of the swords, then up at Perndabot.*
> 
> " Understood."
